author: jacopoc
msg: Fix for bug that happens when you reload demo data (ant run-install) over existing data when you have already created at least one invoice.
The problem is that the PartyAcctgPreference.lastInvoiceNumber field (that contains the number of the last invoice) is overriden with 0.

author: jukka
msg: 1.4: Missing import, spotted by Rob Owen (JCR-1355)

author: jeremias
msg: AlphaRasterImage now knows how to deal with TYPE_INT Rasters.
Support natively handling CCITT images in SVG images.
Add fallback to device RGB if sRGB isn't set up as the default color space in PDF.
